abstract: JPMorgan Chase must allow shareholders to vote on measures that would tie executive bonuses to the bank’s long-term stock performance, federal regulators have ruled, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase must allow shareholders to vote on measures that would tie executive bonuses to the bank’s long-term stock performance, federal regulators have ruled, according to Reuters.

headline.main: JPMorgan Is Ordered to Hold Vote on Executive Pay
